text: nabiye, ninnal strikale vivahameacanam ceyyukayanenkil avarkk iddah tutannanulla avasarattil vivahameacanam natattuka. idda kalam ninnal krtyamayi kanakkakkuka. ninnalute nathanaya allahuve suksikkuka. idda velayil avare avarute vitukalilninn purantallarut. avar svayam irannippeavukayumarut. avar vyaktamaya durvrttiyilerppettalallate. allahuvinre niyamaparidhikalaniva. allahuvinre paridhikal langhikkunnavan tanneatu tanneyan akramam ceyyunnat. atinusesam allahu valla putiya karyavum ceytekkam; ninakkat ariyilla
